CustomField.formula: IF(TODAY() - KPI_Last_severe_disruption_Date__c <= 7, "1-7 days ago", IF(TODAY() - KPI_Last_severe_disruption_Date__c <= 14, "8-14 days ago", IF(TODAY() - KPI_Last_severe_disruption_Date__c <= 30, "15-30 days ago", IF(TODAY() - KPI_Last_severe_disruption_Date__c <= 60, "1-2 months ago", IF(TODAY() - KPI_Last_severe_disruption_Date__c <= 90, "2-3 months ago", IF(TODAY() - KPI_Last_severe_disruption_Date__c <= 120, "3-4 months ago", IF(TODAY() - KPI_Last_severe_disruption_Date__c <= 150, "4-5 months ago", IF(TODAY() - KPI_Last_severe_disruption_Date__c <= 180, "5-6 months ago", IF(TODAY() - KPI_Last_severe_disruption_Date__c <= 365, "6 months to 1 year ago", IF(TODAY() - KPI_Last_severe_disruption_Date__c <= 730, "1-2 years ago", IF(TODAY() - KPI_Last_severe_disruption_Date__c > 730, "More than 2 years ago","" )))))))))))
CustomField.label: Krux Time since Last severe disruption
